About Fri

Fri is a UX and Visual Designer—he builds useful products and services using common sense and user centric approach for private businesses, NGOs, and the government.

Fri is currently working as UX UI Designer for HappyFresh and writes about user experience, design, and startups at http://frirasyidi.com.

Prior to UX design, Fri worked as a visual design freelancer working mainly in hand illustration, pitch decks, and branding.

Aside from being a designer, Fri also have two years of experience being a business and community manager as the Chief of the first coworking space in Jakarta.

Notable Timeline

  • UX UI Designer for HappyFresh, 2016 to present
  • UX Consultant for Satgas P2EBT of ESDM, 2016
  • Mentor and Organizer for Lean Startup Machine Jakarta, 2015
  • UX UI Designer for Happy5, 2015 to 2016
  • UX, Content Manager, and Web Localization Expert for World Resources Institute, 2014-2015
  • PDF Accessibility Expert for OVAE Online Courses Design Evaluation and Repair of American Institutes for Research, 2013
  • Chief of Comma Coworking Space, 2013 to 2015
  • Freelance Designer, 2010 to present
  • Business Management Undergraduate at SBM-ITB, 2008 to 2011

Fri is a UX and Visual Designer who resides in Jakarta.
He worked for startups, NGOs, and the Government.
